pullRequest.title: Lots of entity mappings
pullRequest.bodyText:
Lots of specific entity mappings, mostly by me, a few by RubiksImplosion when he joined in with multiplayer enigma.
A passive and hostile mob mappings which can be done are done, except for some brain-related stuff, because I'm not familiar with how the brain system works.

nodes.bodyText: targetNotVisibleTicks
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -1,10 +1,16 @@

+	FIELD field_7214 eyeOffset F
+	FIELD field_7215 eyeOffsetCooldown I
 	FIELD field_7216 BLAZE_FLAGS Lnet/minecraft/class_2940;
 	METHOD method_26906 createBlazeAttributes ()Lnet/minecraft/class_5132$class_5133;
 	METHOD method_6993 setFireActive (Z)V
 		ARG 1 fireActive
 	METHOD method_6994 isFireActive ()Z
 	CLASS class_1546 ShootFireballGoal
+		FIELD field_19420 ticksTargetNotVisible I

are these held stacks or armor? are they from the main hand or?

nodes.bodyText: How about playingAnimation ?
This is set to true before the damage is done, and is only used to tell the client to start playing the animation. I would suggest startedAttack.
